ru.dz.ccu825.transport

Interface IModBusConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CCU825_j2mod_connector, EmptyModbusConnector, TestChatModbusConnector

    public interface IModBusConnection
    ModBus connection interface, as needed by CCU825 protocol.

    Provide your implementation or use sample one, see subclasses.

    Just one function, interface is simplified to minimum.

    Author:
    dz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Must be called before any attempt to use rwMultiple.
      void disconnect()
      Well, disconnect from transport.
      byte[] rwMultiple(int nRead, byte[] writeData)
      fn23 r/w multiple interface, reduced to what CU825 protocol needs.

      Set connector-specific target address, such as serial RS485 device port, TCP/IP address or so.

      ModBus bus unit address.

    • Method Detail

      • setDestination

        void setDestination(java.lang.String dest)
        Set connector-specific target address, such as serial RS485 device port, TCP/IP address or so.

        For j2mod:

      • "device:com2" - serial port on Windows
      • "tcp:localhost:502" - modbus/tcp server on localhost port 502
Parameters:
dest - Connector-specific address to connect to.

  • setSpeed

    void setSpeed(int baud)
    Called before connect() to set serial port parameters.
    Parameters:
    baud - always 9600

  • setModbusUnitId

    void setModbusUnitId(int unit)
    ModBus bus unit address. First field of a modbus packet.

    You can find/set one in CCU825-SM configuration software on the 'common connection parameters' page, in 'modbus device address' field. Usually = 1.

    Parameters:
    unit - Unit id - see CCU825 configurator's parameters.

  • connect

    void connect()
             throws CCU825Exception
    Must be called before any attempt to use rwMultiple.
    Throws:
    CCU825Exception - if connection fails.

  • disconnect

    void disconnect()
    Well, disconnect from transport.

  • rwMultiple

    byte[] rwMultiple(int nRead,
                byte[] writeData)
                  throws CCU825ProtocolException
    fn23 r/w multiple interface, reduced to what CU825 protocol needs. Write count is taken from writeData size.
    Parameters:
    nRead - number of 16 bit registers to read
    writeData - data to write
    Returns:
    bytes read
    Throws:
    CCU825Exception
    CCU825ProtocolException
